column2: "/ci1 2 Oh, is that the Guardian? This proved a little too much for us. Will you lend us your aid?"
"/ci2 3 t5 Try not to get carried away with your merry-making, Harriet. Though I must confess, I do see the appeal."
"I agree, Harriet. No amount of merriment is worth sustaining a serious injury."

"It seems that I miscalculated...
Harriet, I leave the rest to you..."

"Harriet...!
There now, rest a while. You can leave what remains to me."
